price: (14) [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
arabic: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā tadʿū al-yawma thubūran wāḥidan wa-id'ʿū thubūran kathīran
